annotations.description: Learn how to make the Benton's Old Fashioned AKA the Bacon fat washed Old Fashioned, this iconic cocktail from the world-reknowned New York City speakeasy ba...
annotations.title: Epic BACON fat washed Old Fashioned recipe - How to fat wash a spirit

textContent:
2 oz Bacon fat washed bourbon
0.25 oz B grade maple syrup
2 Dashes Angostura bitters
Orange twist

Pour the bourbon, maple syrup and bitters in a mixing glass
Add ice and stir for about 60 revolutions
Strain over fresh ice in a rocks glass
Express the orange twist and garnish with it
While you're there, why not add a slice of cooked bacon ;)
